Text: Mackey's proposal would create a new grant program, funded with $25 million in state money, to provide to school districts with high-need special education students, such as those who have exceptional medical challenges that require special care while attending school.
Cause: provide to school districts with high-need special education students, such as those who have exceptional medical challenges that require special care while attending school.
Effect: Mackey's proposal would create a new grant program, funded with $25 million in state money
Sentence: <e2>Mackey's proposal would create a new grant program, funded with $25 million in state money</e2>, to <e1>provide to school districts with high-need special education students, such as those who have exceptional medical challenges that require special care while attending school.</e1>
